events.name: onInitialized
events.description:
This event is fired after the framework is initialized. 
Note that not all bound symbols may have finished their initial value resolving at this time when a symbol is working asynchronous for example.

events.name: onLocaleChanged
events.description: This event is fired after a (perhaps new) locale has been loaded.

events.name: onThemeDataChanged
events.description:
This event is fired after the theme json and all css files have been loaded at a theme change. 
It is additionally fired when a new font-face file has been fetched or devicePixelRatio has changed.

events.name: onUserChanged
events.description: This event is fired, if a new user is logged in.

events.name: onUserDataChanged
events.description: This event is fired, if a new user is logged in or the user configuration (group membership, timezone...) of the logged in user has changed.

events.name: onUserInGroupChanged
events.description: This event is fired after a user is known to be in different usergroups or no authentication is required.

events.name: onConfigChanged
events.description: This event is fired when the tchmiconfig.json has changed. This file can only change while engineering.

events.name: onSystemKeyboardOpened
events.description: This event is fired after the system keyboard is opened or another text element is focused.

events.name: onSystemKeyboardClosed
events.description: This event is fired after the system keyboard is closed.

events.name: onWebsocketOpened
events.description: This is event is fired when the websocket is ready. Please use onServerReady instead.

events.name: onWebsocketClosed
events.description: This is event is fired when the websocket was closed. Please use onServerNotReady instead.

events.name: onServerReady
events.description: This is event is fired when framework and server handshakes are done.

events.name: onServerNotReady
events.description: This is event is fired when the framework to server connection is no longer ready. Will only be raised when the connection was ready before.
